overview: A documentary about The Abyss Festival, in Gothenburg, Sweden, March 2019.  The film features the following bands; Tormentor, Sodom, Primordial, Grim Reaper, Malokarpatan, Primordial, Black Viper, Root, Quartz, Antichrist, Chevalier, Iron Angel, Satan, Demon, Rapid, Divlje Jagode, Alien Force, Aura Noir.
title: Into the Abyss
